1520673721_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJV.body: You don't. "for security reasons". Someone could potentially embed an image from the clearnet and get the IP of someone on ZeroNet. For this to change, there would have to be some sort of check in place to ensure that any linked images come from ZeroNet sources. Possible, but not currently implemented
